did.unittitle: Quarterly Financial Statement of the Membership of the Nicholasville Christian Church
did.abstract: The Quarterly Financial Statement of the Membership of the Nicholasville Christian Church (dated 1925; 0.01 cubic feet; 1 item) comprises a printed financial statement documenting the 1925 payments and pledges of church members.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Nicholasville Christian Church was founded in 1828 by George W. Elley.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2012ms740: [identification of item], Quarterly Financial Statement of the Membership of the Nicholasville Christian Church, 1925, University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Quarterly Financial Statement of the Membership of the Nicholasville Christian Church (dated 1925; 0.01 cubic feet; 1 item) comprises a printed financial statement documenting the 1925 payments and pledges of church members.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The physical rights to the materials in this collection are held by the University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center.

did.unittitle: Quarterly Financial Statement of the Membership of the Nicholasville Christian Church
